channel.title: Comments on: Netflix Gems of 2010
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Sometimes I really want a TiMER and sometimes I'm glad I don't know.
item.content:encoded: Sometimes I really want a TiMER and sometimes I’m glad I don’t know.

item.title: By: Kelly
item.dc:creator: Kelly
item.description: I loved TiMER...wish it were that simple sometimes. And I really loved Cashback...also a beautiful soundtrack.
item.content:encoded: I loved TiMER…wish it were that simple sometimes. And I really loved Cashback…also a beautiful soundtrack.
